description: It’s all about the ingredients here. Throw them together and enjoy this wonderful salad for a blast of Italian flavors.

default: 200g/7oz mix of bitter leaves, such as at least three of these: cime de rape, puntarelle, radicchio, chicory and curly endive
6 ripe figs, quartered or 2 ripe white peaches, stone removed and sliced
500g/1lb 2oz flavourful ripe tomatoes, core removed, cut into wedges

steps: Mix the leaves and rocket in a large serving bowl. Top with chunks of fig or white peach, torn pieces of ham, shavings of Parmesan, chunks of gorgonzola and tomato wedges.
Sprinkle on the capers, basil leaves and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar before tossing well and serving.
title: Bologna sum up salad
